agent package¶

agent.agent¶

class agent.agent.Agent[source]¶

Bases: object

Bold-Falcon agent, it runs inside guest.

Parameters

  • system – platform

  • analyzer_path – analyzer path

  • analyzer_pid (int) – analyzer pid

  • error_message – None

  • current_status – STATUS_INIT = 0x0001,STATUS_RUNNING = 0x0002,STATUS_COMPLETED = 0x0003,STATUS_FAILED = 0x0004

  • analyzer_folder – upload analyzer folder

  • results_folder – results folder
